incompatible_protocol_version: <prefix> <red>Unable</red> to activate native <yellow>client support</yellow> because of <red>incompatible protocol versions</red>

warp.copy: <prefix> You have <green>copied</green> the warp <yellow><warp></yellow> from <gray><src></gray> to <gray><dst></gray>
warp.move: <prefix> You have <green>moved</green> the warp <yellow><warp></yellow> from <gray><src></gray> to <gray><dst></gray>

teleport.others_multiple: <prefix> You have <yellow>teleported</yellow> <yellow><target_count></yellow> entities to the warp <yellow><warp></yellow> <gray>(<warp_path>)</gray>

folder.delete: <prefix> You have <red>deleted</red> the folder <yellow><folder></yellow> <gray>(<folder_path>)</gray> and its content
folder.copy: <prefix> You have <green>copied</green> the folder <yellow><folder></yellow> from <gray><src></gray> to <gray><dst></gray>
folder.move: <prefix> You have <green>moved</green> the folder <yellow><from></yellow> from <gray><src></gray> to <gray><dst></gray>

teleportation_history.send_to_previous_entry: <prefix> You have been <yellow>reverted</yellow> your last <yellow><entries></yellow> teleportations
teleportation_history.send_to_next_entry: <prefix> You have been <yellow>reapplied</yellow> your next <yellow><entries></yellow> teleportations

error.error_occurred: <prefix> An <red>Error occurred</red> whilst performing this action
error.no_permission: <prefix> You <red>do not</red> have the required <yellow>permissions</yellow> to perform this action
error.warp_already_exists: <prefix> A warp with the path <yellow><path></yellow> <red>already</red> exists
error.folder_already_exists: <prefix> A folder with the path <yellow><path></yellow> <red>already</red> exists
error.node_already_exists: <prefix> A node with the path <yellow><path></yellow> <red>already</red> exists
error.move_folder_into_child: <prefix> <red>Unable</red> to move folder, destination is a child of the source folder

teleportation_log.no_previous_entry: <prefix> <red>No previous record</red> exists in the teleportation log
teleportation_log.no_next_entry: <prefix> <red>No next record</red> exists in the teleportation log
